author: Subbarao Kambhampati (కంభంపాటి సుబ్బారావు) @rao2z
text:
When asked how he got to be the "Great One," a man from the far north--where @ylecun spent some formative time--famously said

"I skate to where the puck is going to be, not where it has been" 

He could easily have been referring to all foundational research. 

It's FAIR to say that I can't think of anyone whose educated guesses on the future trajectory of the #AI puck I would follow more closely than those of Yann. 

Best wishes, mon AMI!
